ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (($Permission.BO_Checker_NFT = TRUE && $Permission.BO_Signer = FALSE) || $Permission.BO_Maker_NFT_ISSUER = TRUE || ($Permission.BO_Maker_NFT = TRUE && $Permission.BO_Signer = FALSE)) && TEXT(Status) = 'Closed' && NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration)
